dashboard.totalTradeMetricsTooltip: Overview of the most important key figures for the entire trade.
dashboard.riskPerTradeCurrencyTooltip: The absolute amount of money you risk at most.
dashboard.totalFeesTooltip: The estimated total cost for this trade.
dashboard.maxPotentialProfitTooltip: The maximum net profit if the entire position were closed at the best TP.
dashboard.weightedRRTooltip: The average risk-reward ratio of all partial sales.
dashboard.totalNetProfitTooltip: The accumulated net profit from all partial sales.
dashboard.soldPositionTooltip: The total percentage of the position sold.
dashboard.netProfitTooltip: The estimated profit for this partial sale.
dashboard.priceChangeTooltip: The percentage price movement from entry.
dashboard.returnOnCapitalTooltip: The percentage profit in relation to the capital.
dashboard.partialVolumeTooltip: The quantity of units for this partial sale.

takeProfitTargets.tooltip: Here you can see the calculated key figures for each of your partial take-profit targets.

summaryResults.maxNetLossTooltip: The maximum amount you can lose on this trade, including all fees.
summaryResults.requiredMarginTooltip: The capital blocked from your account for this trade.
summaryResults.estimatedLiquidationPriceTooltip: Estimated price at which your position will be liquidated.
summaryResults.breakEvenPriceTooltip: The price at which your trade makes zero profit/loss, considering fees.

dashboard.promptForData: Please enter the required trade data to start the calculation.

journal.title: Trade Journal
journal.noTradesYet: No trades in the journal yet.

seo.title: Posidex - Trading Position Size & Risk Calculator
seo.description: Posidex is a comprehensive trading calculator for position sizing, risk management, and take-profit targets. Optimize your trades with real-time calculations and visual analysis.
seo.keywords: trading calculator, position size, risk management, take profit, crypto trading, forex trading, stock trading, trading tools, financial calculator, trade optimizer
